SELECT /* WBDASafetyListMapper.selectCarbonList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수대기' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '마감' END AS ACCT_STATUS , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '2' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '1' ELSE '3' END AS STATUS_ORD ,DATEDIFF(ACCS_END_DTM,NOW()) AS D_DAY ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
ORDER BY STATUS_ORD, CASE WHEN STATUS_ORD = 1 THEN ACCS_END_DTM WHEN STATUS_ORD = 2 THEN ACCS_STRT_DTM WHEN STATUS_ORD = 3 THEN CASE WHEN BSN_END_DTM IS NULL THEN ACCS_END_DTM ELSE BSN_END_DTM END END DESC
LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /* WBDASafetyListMapper.getCarbonListTotCnt*/ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN '사업진행예정' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN '사업진행중' ELSE '사업종료' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' WHEN NOW() > ACCS_END_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE03' WHEN NOW() >= BSN_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < BSN_END_DTM THEN 'STATE04' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
SELECT /* WBDASafetyListMapper.selectGiveList*/ GIVE_SEQ ,EPISD_SEQ ,GIVE_ORD ,STRT_DT ,END_DT FROM CX_EPISD_GIVE_DTL WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY GIVE_SEQ ASC
